text: You can tell the strength of a nation by the women behind its men.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

text: Do not share the knowledge with which you have been blessed with everyone in general, as you do with some people in particular and know that there are some men in whom Allah, may He he glorified, has placed hidden secrets, which they are forbidden to reveal.
author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

text: Men and women of every faith and good people with none at all sincerely strive to do right and lead a purpose-driven life.
author: Mitt Romney

text: When my mom ran for the Senate, my dad was there for her every step of the way. I can still hear her saying in her beautiful voice, 'Why should women have any less say than men, about the great decisions facing our nation?'
author: Mitt Romney

text: To die for an idea it is unquestionably noble. But how much nobler it would be if men died for ideas that were true!
author: H. L. Mencken
